name: MTLArgumentDescriptor
desc: A representation of an argument within an argument buffer.

items.name: var dataType: MTLDataType
items.desc: The data type of the argument.

items.name: var index: Int
items.desc: The index ID of the argument.

items.name: var access: MTLArgumentAccess
items.desc: The access permissions of the argument.

items.name: var arrayLength: Int
items.desc: The length of an array argument.

items.name: var constantBlockAlignment: Int
items.desc: The alignment of the constant block.

items.name: var textureType: MTLTextureType
items.desc: The texture type of a texture argument.
